main event: A witness observed a long balloon-shaped object approximately 20 feet in length emitting red lights while traveling alongside their car near Huntley, Illinois.
interesting points: The object had a course that appeared erratic and was noticed during a 3-minute observation period., The object shot out a red light with four beams for 10 minutes before disappearing., Two other side objects followed the witness's car, hovering about 5 feet above the terrain., The witness did not observe the actual moment of disappearance and instead found the objects missing by daylight., It was suggested that the possible fatigue of the observer could have affected the perception of the sighting.
sighted object: long balloon-shaped object with red lights
witness description: The observer appeared mentally normal and completely rational.
